page.title: 02HOUSING SURVEY CHURCH LAWTON
page.content: Results of this survey cover 100 homes within the Parish of Church Lawton. {Nos (%) {1. }Bungalows 4 ( 4%) {2. }Detached dwellings 41 (41%) {3. }Residents under 16 years 99 (33%) {4. }Adults working 8+ hrs/wk 132 (87%) {5. }Female residents 155 (51%) {6. }Cars owned by residents 132 {7. }Dwellings with no car 8 ( 8%) {8. }Motorbikes 11 {9. }Homes with dogs 103 (34%) {10.}Homes with extensions 33 (33%) {11.}Homes with garages 75 (75%) {12.}Homes with greenhouses 15 (15%) {13.}Homes with coalfires 16 (16%) {14.}Homes with telephones 91 (91%) {15.}Homes with caravans 12 (12%) {16.}Homes owned by occupiers 80 (80%) {17.}Homes occupied by 1 person 7 ( 7%) {18.}Homes sold in last year 11 (11%)
